name: UniversalJumpscare
description: A jumpscare that can pop up anywhere. Comes with GIF support!

jumpscareImage.name: Jumpscare Image File
jumpscareImage.description:
Choose the image of your jumpscare here. GIFs, PNGs, and WEBPs supported!

<c-ff0000>No, there will never be randomization support.</c>

jumpscareImageFillMode.name: Jumpscare Image Fill Mode
jumpscareImageFillMode.description:
Select a fill mode for the jumpscare image.

- Fit to Screen: Fits the image within the window while keeping the image's aspect ratio.
- Fill Screen: The image fills the window while keeping the image's original aspect ratio.
- Stretch to Fill Screen: Ignores the image's original aspect ratio to fill the entire game window.
- Center: Places the image at the center of the screen (and uses the scale you selected in "Sisyphus: Center Fill Mode Scale".

jumpscareImageScale.name: Jumpscare Image Scale (for Center Fill Mode)
jumpscareImageScale.description: The scale being used when using the <cl>Center</c> Fill Mode option from the <cl>"Jumpscare Image Fill Mode"</c> setting.

jumpscareFadeOutDelay.name: Jumpscare Image Delay Before Fade Out
jumpscareFadeOutDelay.description: The time spent before fading out the jumpscare image.

jumpscareFadeOutTime.name: Jumpscare Image Fade Out Time
jumpscareFadeOutTime.description: The time spent fading out the jumpscare image.

jumpscareAudio.name: Jumpscare SFX File
jumpscareAudio.description:
Choose the file of your jumpscare SFX. Leave blank to disable. MP3s, OGGs, WAVs, FLACs, and OGAs supported!

<c-ff0000>No, there will never be randomization support.</c>

jumpscareAudioVolume.name: Jumpscare SFX Volume (%)
jumpscareAudioVolume.description: Set the volume of your jumpscare SFX (as a percentage).

probabilityNumerator.name: Probability (Numerator)
probabilityNumerator.description:
The numerator for the likelihood of the jumpscare.

# <c-ff0000>***__Don't try anything funny.__***</c>

probabilityDenominator.name: Probability (Denominator)
probabilityDenominator.description:
The denominator for the likelihood of the jumpscare.

# <c-ff0000>***__Don't try anything funny.__***</c>

visibilityInPlayLayer.name: Visibility When Playing Levels
visibilityInPlayLayer.description: Adjust the visibility of the jumpscare image when playing levels.

hideInLevelEditorLayer.name: Hide When Editing Levels
hideInLevelEditorLayer.description: Adjust the visibility of the jumpscare image when editing levels.

hideEverywhereElse.name: Hide Outside Of Levels
hideEverywhereElse.description: Hides the the jumpscare image outside of levels.

forceHideIfJumpscareStillActive.name: Force Hide if Jumpscare is Still Active When Switching Menus or Exiting/Entering Levels
